I blackmailed the CIA to force an investigation into what he did in El Salvador.
translation.fr: J'ai fait chanter la CIA pour forcerune enquête sur ses actes au Salvador.

translation.en: -You think you saved us? -I knew he'd track you eventually.
translation.fr: - Tu crois nous avoir sauvées ?- Je savais qu'il viendrait.

translation.en: You didn't save us. I got Vee away from him.
translation.fr: Tu nous as pas sauvées. Je l'ai éloigné de Vee.

translation.en: I took care of her every goddamn day and made sure she was safe.
translation.fr: J'ai fait en sortequ'elle soit en sécurité.

translation.en: Now she's out there with him because of you.
translation.fr: Et elle est avec lui à cause de toi.

translation.en: You're no damn hero. You're a fucking coward.
translation.fr: T'es pas une héroïne ! T'es lâche !

translation.en: -Wow. -All that rage that that man felt.
translation.fr: Toute la rage que cet homme ressentait.

translation.en: All the rage inside of that man that he felt,
that he aimed towards me, is because of you.
translation.fr: qu'il a dirigée contre moi,c'est à cause de toi !

translation.en: Not everybody is meant to be a mother.
translation.fr: On n'est pas toutes faitespour être mère !

translation.en: Yeah, maybe not.
But you could have been a little more human.
translation.fr: Mais t'aurais pu être plus humaine.

translation.en: You drove past our trailer every day.
translation.fr: Tu passaisdevant chez nous tous les jours.

translation.en: You drove past your own granddaughter, Lou.
translation.fr: Tu passais devant ta petite-fille, Lou.

translation.en: You didn't talk to her. You didn't speak to her. You didn't look at her.
translation.fr: Tu lui parlais pas,tu la regardais même pas !

translation.en: What kind of person could do that to their own family?
translation.fr: Qui ferait ça à sa propre famille ?

translation.en: [grunts] Come on. We gotta keep moving.
There ain't no more "we."
Hannah, you don't know where they're going.
translation.fr: Hannah, tu sais pas où ils vont.

translation.en: You said the lighthouse. I'll follow the coastline.
translation.fr: Tu as dit le phare.Je vais suivre la côte.

translation.en: Not on your own. It's a trap.
translation.fr: Pas toute seule. C'est un piège.

translation.en: -Please. There's one thing I'm good for. -Not anymore.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît.Je suis douée pour une chose. Plus maintenant.

translation.en: You'll just slow me down.
[Philip screaming] Mama! Mama! Mama! Mom!
Are you okay?
Never thought I'd be excited to see you.
translation.fr: Qui aurait cruque je serais contente de te voir ?

translation.en: -First time for everything. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Il y a un début à tout. Où est Hannah ?

translation.en: -Where's Hannah? -On her way to the lighthouse.
translation.fr: Il y a un début à tout. Où est Hannah ? En route pour le phare.

translation.en: And her daughter?
translation.fr: En route pour le phare. Et sa fille ?

translation.en: -Already there with the… -Okay.
…the kidnapper.
He's armed. Very dangerous.
That's exactly what the feds said about you.
translation.fr: C'est ce que les fédéraux ont dit de toi.

translation.en: You stay here. I'll send someone for you as soon as the road's clear.
translation.fr: Reste ici. J'envoie quelqu'undès que les routes sont dégagées.

translation.en: Wait. For fuck's sake, help me outside. I'm suffocating in here.
translation.fr: Attends. Putain, aide-moi à sortir.J'étouffe ici.

translation.en: -Come on. I got this. -[groans]
You gonna tell me why the CIA's lookin' for you, Lou?
translation.fr: Pourquoi la CIA te recherche, Lou ?

translation.en: [Lou] I used some evidence I held onto.
translation.fr: J'ai utilisé des preuves que j'avais.

translation.en: -[groans] -What kind of evidence?
Documents. Proving CIA involvement in the coup in Iran.
translation.fr: Des documents prouvant l'implicationde la CIA dans le coup d'État en Iran.

translation.en: Ah. I can see why they'd be pissed about that.
translation.fr: Des documents prouvant l'implicationde la CIA dans le coup d'État en Iran. Je comprends qu'ils soient furieux.Lou, ils arrivent.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Lou, they're on their way.
translation.fr: Je comprends qu'ils soient furieux.Lou, ils arrivent.

translation.en: [Lou] Fuck, they won't care about collateral damage. You gotta get Hannah and Vee out of there.
translation.fr: Ils se ficheront de faire des victimes.Va chercher Hannah et Vee.

translation.en: [Lou] Come on.
[groans] This thing starts up again, I'm gonna bleed out.
translation.fr: C'est rouvert,je vais me vider de mon sang.

translation.en: Will you get the first-aid kit? I left it in there.
translation.fr: La trousse de secours.Je l'ai laissée là-bas.

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
[Vee screams] Mommy!
-[Vee] Mommy! -[Hannah] Vee!
-[Vee] Come! Please, come! -[panting]
-Vee! -I'm here, Mama!
-Up here! -I'm coming!
[breathing heavily] Baby?
-Mommy! -[Hannah laughs]
Hi, Mommy.
[sighs] Hi, baby.
We were afraid you weren't gonna show up. Weren't we, Vee?
translation.fr: On avait peurque tu ne viennes pas, hein ?

translation.en: You okay?
Of course she's okay. She's with her daddy.
translation.fr: Bien sûr qu'elle va bien.Elle est avec son papa.

translation.en: Come, give Mommy a hug.
Hey, how's-- how's Lou doin'? Is she-- Is she on her way?
Jesus, look at me. [chuckles]
Still waitin' for my mommy to come back after all these years, huh?
translation.fr: J'attends toujours ma mamanaprès toutes ces années.

translation.en: But we do need her here to finish this.
translation.fr: Mais on a besoin d'elle pour finir ça.

translation.en: I wanna give Mommy a hug.
translation.fr: Je veux faire un câlin à maman.

translation.en: Philip, please.
[Vee] Please, Daddy?
One quick hug while we wait for Lou.
translation.fr: Un petit câlin en attendant Lou.

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, I missed you so much.
[whispers] Game on.
Daddy, may I go to the bathroom?
translation.fr: Papa, je peux aller aux toilettes ?

translation.en: [Philip] Of course you can, Vee.
But hey… Come right back, okay?
translation.fr: Mais reviens tout de suite, d'accord ?

translation.en: Wow, Lou is really rubbin' off on you.
Come on, just give me the gun. We both know you're not gonna shoot me.
translation.fr: Donne-moi ça.On sait que tu me tueras pas.

translation.en: You don't know me, Phil. You never did.
translation.fr: Tu me connais pas. - Tu m'as jamais connue.- Non ?

translation.en: [Philip] No?
I know that if you were gonna shoot me, you would have done it years ago.
translation.fr: Si t'avais voulu me tuer,tu l'aurais fait il y a des années.

translation.en: I know that you're not like Lou and me.
translation.fr: T'es pas comme Lou et moi.

translation.en: You're not.
Yeah, 'cause she would've shot me already.
Come on. Give me the gun.
You abandon me, and then you steal my baby from me,
translation.fr: Tu m'abandonnes, tu me voles mon bébéet maintenant, tu me tires dessus ?

translation.en: and now you shoot me?
translation.fr: tu me voles mon bébéet maintenant, tu me tires dessus ?

translation.en: That shit won't work on me. Not gonna work on me anymore, Phil.
translation.fr: Ça marchera pas sur moi !Ça marchera plus, Phil.

translation.en: [shudders] I'm not afraid of you anymore.
And I won't let you hurt my little girl the way you hurt me.
translation.fr: Je te laisserai pas blesser ma fillecomme tu m'as blessée.

translation.en: Do you remember?
Do you remember…
how it felt?
[shakily] Yeah. [gasping] I remember.
Vee! We have to run!
[Hannah] Oh shit.
Game's over, okay? Come here, Little Rabbit.
translation.fr: On joue plus, d'accord ?Viens ici, mon lapin.

translation.en: [groans] We gotta go right now.
Oh! Oh, baby. Come on. Get up. Are you okay?
translation.fr: Oh, ma puce. Allez. Lève-toi. Ça va ?

translation.en: Did he hurt you? He didn't hurt you, right?
translation.fr: Il t'a fait du mal ? T'as rien ?

translation.en: Oh! Hide. Hide. Hide.
-Hannah. -[Hannah] Come on.
-[clattering] -We need to move.
-My gun. -[Hannah] Lost it.
-Knife? -Stuck in Philip's hand.
translation.fr: - Le couteau ?- Dans la main de Philip.

translation.en: Try that hatch. Go, go, now.
-Wait, your jacket's stuck. -[Lou] Oh fuck.
translation.fr: Ta veste est coincée. Oh putain.

translation.en: [Hannah] Push you up.
Run to the end of the beach. -Run as fast as you can. -No!
translation.fr: Va au bout de la plage.Cours aussi vite que possible.

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. -Don't leave me.
translation.fr: - Non.- Je te rejoins. C'est trop étroit.

translation.en: We won't fit. You gotta run now. Go, go, go, go. Run, Little Rabbit! Run!
translation.fr: Tu dois t'enfuir.Vas-y. Cours, mon lapin !

translation.en: [Lou] It's rigged. I can't defuse it.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas la désamorcer.

translation.en: Could buy us some time if I can change the frequency.
translation.fr: Je peux gagner du tempsen changeant la fréquence.

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -[panting]
One of us was actually a Girl Scout.
translation.fr: L'une de nous a fait les Scouts.

translation.en: -Do you still have the radio? -Yeah.
Maybe we can use it after all. Go bust that gate open.
translation.fr: On peut peut-être l'utiliser.Essaie d'ouvrir la grille.

translation.en: We're all here.
We're all here.
I was hoping that we could all do this together.
translation.fr: J'espérais qu'on puisse faire ça ensemble,

translation.en: -Face to face! -[bleeping]
So that we could end this… the right way.
translation.fr: pour en finir comme il faut.

translation.en: End this right.
As a family.
As a family.
But sometimes, you don't get what you want.
translation.fr: Mais on n'a pas toujours ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: Fuck!
-[gasping] -[Philip yells] Fuck!
[screams] Fuck! You fuckin' let me in!
Oh shit.
-[Lou] Oh shit. -[Hannah] What?
-[Lou] The CIA's on the hunt. -[barks]
[panting] They comin' for Philip or you?
They won't want either one of us to leave here alive.
translation.fr: Ils nous veulent morts tous les deux.

translation.en: -Go, go. -No.
-I'll just slow you down. -I'm not gonna leave you here.
translation.fr: - Non, je te ralentirai.- Je te laisserai pas ici.

translation.en: Lou, go get your granddaughter to safety. I'll catch up.
translation.fr: Va sauver ta petite-fille.Je vous rejoins.

translation.en: [yells] Fuck!
Oh! Come here.
You're a brave little girl. You know that?
translation.fr: Tu es vraiment courageuse, tu sais ?

translation.en: Good. Help me up, will you?
Okay, listen to me. I want you to go grab a stick, okay?
translation.fr: Bon, écoute-moi. Va chercher un bâton, d'accord ?

translation.en: The longest one you can find. Go, go, go.
-Mommy! -Hey, baby.
Hannah. The radio.
[Hannah] In my pocket.
-[Lou] Come on. -[Hannah] Help me.
-All right. -Come on, go, run.
Hannah, hold this up as high as you can.
translation.fr: Tiens ça le plus haut possible.

translation.en: -[Hannah] Are you calling for help? -[Lou] Yeah.
[Lou] Yeah. That ought to get their attention.
translation.fr: Oui, ça devrait attirer leur attention.

translation.en: You gotta go. Take the road back towards town.
translation.fr: Vous devez filer. Reprenez la route vers la ville.Prenez Jax.

translation.en: -Bring Jax with you. -You… you come with us.
translation.fr: Reprenez la route vers la ville.Prenez Jax. Tu viens avec nous.

translation.en: Hannah, you take care of your kid…
I'll take care of mine.
I left a letter for you at my house. Make sure you find it.
translation.fr: J'ai laissé une lettrepour toi chez moi. Lis-la.

translation.en: Okay. Go on, Vee.
Oh, God damn it.
Don't die on me now, Lou.
Everything that matters is right here in front of you.
translation.fr: Tout ce qui compte est devant toi.

translation.en: I know.
Go. Now!
I'm sorry, kid.
Hey, you got two bracelets now.
Yeah. Just like you.
One's for a friend.
[man] So, out of the blue, she just leaves you and your daughter this house?
translation.fr: Juste comme ça,elle vous laisse cette maison ?

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah, this house and a ton of frozen deer meat.
translation.fr: Oui, cette maisonet une tonne de viande de cerf congelée.

translation.en: It's open.
You guys still around?
We had a few more questions for Ms. Dawson here.
Oh. I hope I'm not interrupting.
[clears throat] Hannah, uh, coroner's got an issue.
translation.fr: Hannah, le légiste a un problème.

translation.en: You're next of kin. He needs a signature to release Philip's body for burial.
translation.fr: T'es le plus proche parent. Il lui fautune signature pour le corps de Philip.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Yeah. Sorry.
Ms. Dawson, did Lou Adell ever mention
translation.fr: Mme Dawson, Lou Adell vous a-t-elle parlé

translation.en: anything about documents from her time in the CIA to you?
translation.fr: Mme Dawson, Lou Adell vous a-t-elle parlé de documentsdu temps où elle était à la CIA ?

translation.en: She'd be a pretty shit spy if she did.
translation.fr: Ce serait une espionne nullesi c'était le cas.

translation.en: If you think of anything…
[chuckles] You gave me a card last time you were here, and the time before that.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez déjà donné votre carte.

translation.en: Anything at all.
All right.
-[agent] Sheriff. -Good to see you again.
translation.fr: - Shérif.- Ravi de vous avoir revus.

translation.en: -Forget them. -Mm.
Looks like you two are ready for Seattle.
translation.fr: On diraitque vous êtes prêtes pour Seattle.

translation.en: Yeah, you're all packed up.
Yeah, almost.
I wanted to tell you, you just did a beautiful job with the memorial service.
translation.fr: Tu as fait du bon boulotavec la cérémonie.

translation.en: -Stop. -No, you did. And I think Lou would have really appreciated it.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Lou aurait vraiment apprécié.

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on now. All that sincere emotion would have made her puke.
translation.fr: Arrêtez.Toute cette émotion l'aurait fait vomir.

translation.en: Oh, well…
-She was her own person. -Mm-hm.
I mean, sometimes, I'm just so damn mad at her, and then…
translation.fr: Parfois, je lui en veux vraiment,

translation.en: [sighs] Other times I miss her.
Isn't that just how it is with family?
translation.fr: C'est comme ça, la famille, non ?

translation.en: [Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais été bavarde,alors je vais faire court.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
translation.fr: La maison est à toi. Vends-la.

translation.en: "There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.fr: Il y a de la viande pour Jaxdans le congélo et de l'argent pour toi.

translation.en: "Life doesn't give you second chances, but sometimes it does offer a fresh start."
translation.fr: La vie ne donne pas de seconde chance,mais elle offre parfois un nouveau départ.

translation.en: "Hannah, you're going to wonder why I did it." "Why I left this all for you."
translation.fr: Hannah, tu vas te demander pourquoij'ai fait ça. Pourquoi je te laisse tout.

translation.en: "The simple answer is,
you'll leave the world a better place than I did."
translation.fr: tu embelliras le mondeplus que je ne l'ai fait.
